dmca.title: [ABUSE] AUP Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Wednesday, May 31, 2006 7:02 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] AUP Violation]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] AUP Violation]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] AUP Violation
Date:         Tue, 30 May 2006 20:58:54 -0700
From:         John Estep <jestep@jettsoft.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         admins@theplanet.com



To whom it may concern,



Your company is hosting at least 2 sites that are displaying our company
logos for download, which is a violation of our copyright and the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. According to your own
Acceptable Use Policy at http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html this is
in violation of your own policies as well.



Please discontinue the use of our logos or remove from the offending
websites ASAP.



Below are the sites:



http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/catalogue/J/20184.html



http://www.allthelogos.com/cgi-bin/logos/show.cgi?action=view&link=Int-L
e_/Jaf-Jo-&image=JettSoft%20%2020184.gif&img=372&tt
<http://www.allthelogos.com/cgi-bin/logos/show.cgi?action=view&link=Int-
Le_/Jaf-Jo-&image=JettSoft%20%2020184.gif&img=372&tt>=



Both these sites are hosted to IP Addresses owned by theplanet.com.





Sincerely,

John T. Estep

JettSoft
